entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. High 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
